Class TroopSpawner

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Building
        • TroopSpawner
  • public class TroopSpawner
extends Building
    TroopSpawners are Buildings (Greenfoot Actors) that spawn troops to march down the battle field to try to win the battle. They randomly spawn a type of troop that marches down to the opposite end of the battle field. TroopSpawners will only spawn one troop at a time, and can only spawn them when they have accumulated enough charge.
    Version:
    April 27, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei

    • Constructor Detail

      • TroopSpawner

        public TroopSpawner​(boolean isRed)
        Create a Troop Spawner building for the specified team.

      • TroopSpawner

        public TroopSpawner​(boolean isRed,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    int maxHP,
                    int maxCharge,
                    int delay)
        Create a Troop Spawner building for the specified team with specified dimensions, HP, charge, and delay.
        Parameters:
        isRed - True if this building belongs to the red team, false if blue team.
        width - Width of the building.
        height - Height of the building.
        maxHP - Maximum HP this building has.
        maxCharge - Amount of charge the building must accumulate to spawn a new troop.
        delay - Rate at which charge is acquired. Larger numbers mean slower charge acquisition.
